Returns: Whether the implementation accepted the request. Note that returning true here doesn't mean an origin has already been assigned as the validation is asynchronous.
Parameters: Uri: A origin that the client is requesting to be identified as during the postMessage communication.
requestPostMessageChannel(android.net.Ur.Description: Sends a request to create a two way postMessage channel between the client and the browser.

Returns: An integer constant about the postMessage request result. Will return @B_android#support#customtabs#CustomTabsService#RESULT_SUCCESS_E@ if successful.
Parameters: String: The message that is being sent.
postMessage(java.lang.String, android.os.Description: Sends a postMessage request using the origin communicated via @B_android#support#customtabs#CustomTabsService#requestPostMessageChannel_E@. Fails when called before @B_android#support#customtabs#PostMessageServiceConnection#notifyMessageChannelReady_E@ is received on the client side.

ClassDesc: A class to be used for Custom Tabs related communication. Clients that want to launch Custom Tabs can use this class exclusively to handle all related communication.
